name: Spider Solitaire by Pokami
description:
Spider Solitaire is a no-brainer for Solitaire enthusiasts and lovers! The app supports retina display and it is distributed as a Universal app supporting iPad, iPhone and iPod devices.


Key App Features:
• Universal build
• Retina support
• Play in either portrait or landscape mode
• Simple one touch controls
• Multiple Undo 
• Auto-complete feature
• Game Statistics
• Colorful backgrounds
• Photo backgrounds from your library
• Does not disrupt music playing through iPod
• Lefty support
• Orientation lock

Spider Solitaire Variations:
• Play with 1, 2 or 4 suits
